summary: This film follows 9 girls from Haiti, Nepal, Ethiopia, India, Egypt, Peru, Cambodia, Sierra Leone, and Afghanistan on their journey to education.
cast: Amina|Azmera|Arindol Bagchi|Rekha Banerjee|Cate Blanchett|Barsha Charttajee|Tripti Chaudhary|Priyanka Chopra|Tanaji Dasgupta|Saheb Dey|Said Faraj|Selena Gomez|Mona Hala|Anne Hathaway|Salma Hayek|Alicia Keys|Prabin Khatiwada|Siddhartha Laha|Mariama|ChloÃ« Grace Moretz|Liam Neeson|Freida Pinto|Supniya Rugni|Ruksana|Elisabeth Salim|Senna|Pratima Shah|Sammy Sheik|Sohka|Meryl Streep|Suma|Nazim Uddin|Shalini Vatsa|Wadley|Kerry Washington|Yasmin
title: Girl Rising
